name: After Dark (itch) (lowlauch)
description: After Dark A game about dying and trying to navigate in the dark. Controls: A - D: Move Space: Jump Credits: Music by my friend Pehus Game by lowlauch Fonts used: Balsamiq Sans Playtesting: leqitbatz, weber, Pehus, memlof, Glemm, lowlauch Made using GameMaker Studio 2 during the 3rd Wowie Game Jam.
